kernfrasen: Look to the rock from which you were hewn
on this rock I will build my church
gates of hell will not prevail
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: THE WORLD IS A HOSTILE SUPERPOWER

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Look to the rock from which you were hewn and the quarry from which you were dug.

cognitieve_implicaties: The believer is made of the same 'substance' as the ancestors.
Identity is fixed and durable, not fluid.
theologische_implicaties: Continuity of the Covenant across millennia.
ethische_implicaties: The need to remain 'solid' against the 'smoke' of the empire.
Responsibility to maintain the shape of the original block.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Rigidity; inability to adapt to new contexts.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the dead metaphor of 'foundation' by using specific quarrying terminology like 'chips off the old block' and 'hewn'.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon centers on the 'Rock' metaphor to bridge the Old and New Testaments. It successfully contrasts the 'Solid Rock' of faith with the 'Fluid/Vanishing' nature of the Empire.

incoherentie_punten.metafoor_a: The Earth as a wearing garment
incoherentie_punten.metafoor_b: The Earth as a Garden of Eden
incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The text moves from the earth being restored to the earth vanishing like smoke.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: Restoration implies continuity; vanishing implies total discontinuity.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The preacher identifies them as 'the same rock,' merging historical ancestry with Christological confession.

sterktes.beschrijving: Takes the cliché 'chip off the old block' and restores its theological weight by linking it to the quarry of Isaiah 51.
sterktes.voorbeeld: fragments of stone taken from that ancient quarry

risicos.beschrijving: The 'Superpower' metaphor is so contemporary it risks becoming a political commentary rather than a theological one.
risicos.voorbeeld: no United States or NATO, no United Methodist Church, no New York Yankees
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may focus on political grievances rather than spiritual identity.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The Ancient Quarry of Israel's memory.

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High impact; creates a sense of the 'penultimate' nature of modern life.

versterkte_schemas.schema_naam: God as the Provider of Impossibilities
versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: By emphasizing the barrenness of Sarah and the deadness of Abraham.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Using the 'Smoke' and 'Gnat' metaphors to diminish the power of the state.
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: The Word of God is the only permanent reality.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly aligns with the Lectionary's pairing of Isaiah and Matthew.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the ARCHITECTURAL/GEOLOGICAL domain (Rock) and the MILITARY/POLITICAL domain (Superpower). This creates a powerful tension between the 'Solid' identity of the believer and the 'Oppressive' but 'Fleeting' nature of the world. The preacher avoids the MEDICAL domain entirely, focusing on identity and endurance rather than healing.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Lean harder into the 'hewing' process—the pain and pressure required to shape a stone.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: Feel the strike of the chisel that separates you from the empire's wall.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The transition between the 'Rock' (Solid) and 'Smoke' (Gas) metaphors.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Explicitly contrast the density of the Rock with the weightlessness of the Smoke.

entailment_checks.metafoor: The Superpower as a Secret Police
entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Implies God's people are in a state of constant paranoia.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Balance with the 'Garden' metaphor to ensure the 'Rock' identity leads to peace, not just resistance.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To bridge the 'Rock' and the 'Garden'—how life grows out of stone.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to bridge testaments. The 'Rock' metaphor provides a cognitive anchor that makes abstract 'faith' feel tangible and ancestral.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Instead of just noting the beauty of the 'Rock' imagery, CMT shows how it functions as a cognitive map for identity preservation.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Moves beyond 'feeling' or 'watching' to the 'conceptual mapping' of how a hearer categorizes their relationship to the state.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals that the preacher uses 'Verticality' (God on high) less than 'Materiality' (Rock vs Smoke) to establish truth-claims.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: Rock from which you were hewn
appendices.notities: The sermon effectively uses 'Schema Disruption' by listing modern institutions (NFL, Yankees) as things that will 'vanish,' forcing the hearer to re-evaluate their mental 'Permanence' schema.
